text: Hi there folks. Does anyone know how I can trigger a serverless function locally using this server `hs-cms-dev-server`  - It seems like it creates a proxy at `<http://hslocal.net>` which keeps wanting to route it to HubSpot under `/hs/serverless/*` instead of my local version

Just to confirm, if a portal has CMS Enterprise but not Sales or Service Enterprise, there is no option to use the automatically bundled webpack serverless function builds (AKA those built in CRM Projects)? The function would need to be pre-bundled locally and then uploaded after?
